function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unclear transmission routes and factors for COVID-19","Impact":"Difficulty in implementing targeted preventive measures and strategies","Mitigation":"Further research to understand the influence of temperature, humidity, air pollution, and other factors on COVID-19 transmission","Technologies":"Data analysis and modeling to identify key transmission factors","People":"Researchers, public health officials, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Contradictory findings on the influence of temperature and humidity on COVID-19 transmission","Impact":"Challenges in predicting and preparing for seasonal changes in transmission","Mitigation":"Continued investigation and collaboration to clarify the relationship between temperature, humidity, and COVID-19 transmission","Technologies":"Data collection, analysis, and international collaboration","People":"Scientists, public health experts, government agencies","Owner":"International health organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Inconsistent findings on the association of temperature and UV radiation with COVID-19 cases","Impact":"Difficulty in developing region-specific strategies to combat the spread of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Region-specific studies and data analysis to understand the impact of temperature and UV radiation on COVID-19 transmission","Technologies":"Epidemiological studies, data analytics, environmental monitoring technologies","People":"Epidemiologists, environmental scientists, public health officials","Owner":"Local health authorities, environmental monitoring agencies"}]}
